ygData.subject: SK Petition
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings fellow Shadowknights, I ve been a subscriber to the list from way back when it was first created.  I ve been keeping a close eye on the recent ideas
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings fellow Shadowknights,

I've been a subscriber to the list from way back when it was first created. I've been keeping a close eye on
the recent ideas for a petition for changes to our class and would be interested in collecting all the ideas
and sending them over to Verant.

I would like to coordinate the efforts of for the petition. If you ask why me, then I'll tell you I've been
playing a shadowknight and only a shadowknight since EQ was released. I am PO of Keziah Tho'tep, a 25th
level SK on the Bristlebane Server. I've more than understood and experience many of the problems have been
discussed here, I especially liked the messages #8 and #9 from Digest #55. I think players like PO Xillith,
PO Tenin and Howard Chan pointed out very reasonable changes that with the proper attention brought to Verant
can be made.

Currently, I'm one of the lead members for a growing RP guild on the Bristlebane server. Our guild consists
of dark races only and our membership at the moment is primarily SK based. I am more than sure that all the
members of my guild will also lend their support in this petition, no matter who decides to present it to
Verant.

Let me know your thoughts on this and we'll try to get all our reasonable ideas organized and ready to
propose to Verant. If anyone else feels they'd rather coordinate this effort, please feel free to do so. I
just haven't seen a large enough movement to do so by anyone except Amatai, the moderator of this onelist. I
will say that Amatai and I do play on the same server and we do have our differences IC and OOC, and I prefer
to handle this rather than turn it over to Amatai.

Any comments or ideas should be submitted to skpetition@...

Thanks, and I hope to hear from you all.


Allan

-PO of Keziah Tho'tep
SK & member of Innoruuk's Brood on Bristlebane
